project.name: C-C805C-OSSL-01-ST03-DT04-DF16-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C805C-OSSL-01-ST03-DT04-DF16-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Generate an RSA private key Good inputs:1) envrionment variable is set to a value whose length is less than or equal to 8 charsBad inputs:1) environment variable is not set2) environment variable is set to a value whose length is greater than 8 chars

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hello" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C805C-OSSL-01-ST03-DT04-DF16-CF23-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: Generate SSL certificate and private key Good inputs:1) envrionment variable is set to a value whose length is less than or equal to 8 charsBad inputs:1) environment variable is not set2) environment variable is set to a value whose length is greater than 8 chars
iopair.run_command: req -new -newkey rsa:2048 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout good-10/server.key -out good-10/server.crt -subj "/C=SP/ST=The Moon/L=TheDarkSide/O=KSP/OU=Moon Department/CN=ksp.moon"

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hello" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-10-1 AND GOOD-10-2 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
